sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
v-container
	h1 Ferramentas Cadastradas
	span aqui: {{ tools }}
	v-divider
  
	p(v-if="tools.length <= 0") Nenhuma ferramenta cadastrada...
	
	div(class="list-group")
		CardTool(v-for="(tool, index) in tools", :key="index", v-bind:tool="tool", v-on:remove-tool='removeTool')
		
</template>

<script>
import CardTool from '../components/CardTool.vue'


export default {
	components: {
		CardTool
	},

	data () {},

	methods: {
		removeTool(index) {
			// this.tools.splice(index, 1)
			this.$store.dispatch('removeTool', index)
		}
	},

	computed: {
		// allTools() {
		// 	return this.tools.map(tool => ({
		// 		...tool,
		// 		icon: !tool.type.trim() ? 'mdi-help-circle-outline' : (tool.type === 'Manual' ? 'mdi-pipe-wrench' : 'mdi-power-plug'),
		// 		type: !tool.type.trim() ? 'Não especificado' : tool.type,
		// 	}))
		// },

		tools(){
			return this.$store.state.tools
		},
	},

	watch: {
		tools(val){
			console.log('Ferramentas alteradas')
			console.log(val)
		}
	}
}
</script>

<style>
</style>
